thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Adrian

author: Adrian
title: Adrian
text:
We have found the Servcorp team, including the manager Sylvia Gilbert, at Southbank Riverside (Melbourne, Australia) as a very professional and reliable support for Glass Lawyers. Most of our clients are from overseas and we have been able to rely on the Servcorp staff to answer calls and take precise messages from our clients. We have also been impressed by the Servcorp team's efficiency and dedication in maintaining a high standard at the Southbank Riverside offices.
Highly recommended.
